original_text: ‘Son of man, weep for the many people of Egypt. Send them down to the place of dead people, deep under the ground. They will be there in their graves with the people of other powerful nations. ‘Son of man, weep for the many people of Egypt. Send them down to the place of dead people, deep under the ground. They will be there in their graves with the people of other powerful nations. ‘Son of man, weep for the many people of Egypt. Send them down to the place of dead people, deep under the ground. They will be there in their graves with the people of other powerful nations.
korean_text: 인자야 애굽의 무리를 위하여 슬피 울고 그와 유명한 나라의 여자들을 구덩이에 내려가는 자와 함께 지하에 던지며

sentences.original_text: Son of man
weep for the many people of Egypt
Send them down
to the place of dead people
deep under the ground
They will be there in their graves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 무덤 속에 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: with the people of other powerful nations
